cWIP_Options_T: Ultimate Localization Manager Setting 中文模組設定
cWIP_DevelopeMode_D: awcjack is watching you! v(^=.=^)v Tast is behind you v(^=.=^)v
cWIP_NoUpper_D: awcjack is watching you!v(^=.=^)v Tast is behind you v(^=.=^)v (Required to restart game to apply change).
cWIP_NetDebugMode_D: awcjack is watching you!v(^=.=^)v Tast is behind you v(^=.=^)v
cWIP_StringIDType_D: Translated Text, StringID Only, StringID & Translated text (Required to restart game to apply change).
cWIP_SayTranslate_D: Translate the message in chat to English (Google Translate)
cWIP_options_Download_font_D: The font you using has update, you can choose Update now, Not now or Bypass this update.
cWIP_options_ShowTran_T: Toggle displaying the text in game
cWIP_options_ShowTran_T_mod: Toggle displaying the text from mod
cWIP_options_ShowTran_D: Toggle displaying the text by file
cWIP_Outputer_D: Extract from the string file, import from another file and then export it out.
cWIP_display_D: ：Display the translated text from this file (Required to restart game to apply change).
cWIP_language_select_D: Choose the language of payday 2.選擇遊戲語言 (Required to restart game to apply change).
cWIP_Auto_update_D: Toggle the function of auto update translated text.
cWIP_Lang_D: Download Language pack, Study foreign language!(Required network)(Recommend reset language to English after download, prevent the order got disrupt by new language).
cWIP_auto_check_font_D: Toggle the function of auto update font. If you disable it, you must press the button "Download / Update Font" to update.
cWIP_Lang_Quickmenu_D:
Choose the desired language and then wait (Required network).
 Note: Recommend reset language to English after download, prevent the new language disrupt the order.
cWIP_Download_font_D: Download the font of that language, ensure after restart the game can display the translated text correctly (Required network).
cWIP_Language_exist_message:
That Language exist in your mod folder, if you cannot swap to that languagem you can press the "Re-Download" button to overwirte it or you can contact developer. Would you like to redonwload it?
If everything work properly, would you like to check update?
cWIP_Language_updating_D: Updating or redownloading, please wait a few seconds.
cWIP_Language_updated_D: Download Complete, please restart the game to reload the content.
cWIP_Language_no_update_D:
Cannot found update on the Internet, your file is latest already.
 If you found some text which is not translated yet, please contact developer or click the "Re-Download" button.
cWIP_font_update_D:
Font found update, please click "Update Now" to ensure the font is latest which able to display all special symbol in payday 2.
 "Bypass this update" means the game won't notice you when you start game.
 "Not now" means next time return to main menu will pop out this menu again.
cWIP_Lang_update_D:
Translated text found update, please click "Update Now" to ensure the content is latest.
 "Not now" means pop out this menu when you return to main menu again.
cWIP_Lang_mod_D: If you installed another mod(s), you can enter this menu to check whether that mod have translated text on Internet or not.(Translated text(s) are not provided by awcjack, encounter any problems please contact translator.)
cWIP_Lang_mod_quickmenu_D: If you installed another mod(s), you may click the language to check whether that mod have translated text on Internet or not.
cWIP_Lang_mod_list_D:
Those are mod translated text, the prefix is translator name, suffix is mod name, please choose desired text.

 Note: Auto update not yet implement, you should redownload it if update available.
cWIP_Lang_mod_DL_error_D: File error, please contact developer or translator to check the file status.
cWIP_Contact_author_D: Open Steam group page (Required Steam overlay)。
cWIP_options_Dev_Only_D: If you encounter some problems or you wish to help with development, you should try it! (I haven't any responsibility on fixing your computer if you just press it randomly :D).
